comments.content:
London Design Collective, the people behind this little site, is an interesting example of what happens when people concentrate on what they are good at rather than chasing pipe dreams of web fortunes. I used to work with the guys at my last employer, Entranet, before they went belly-up. Interesting article on this co, and a few others, on the Guardian website at:   
 [http://www.guardian.co.uk/online/story/0,3605,762420,00.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018143700/http:/www.guardian.co.uk/online/story/0%2C3605%2C762420%2C00.html)
